name: Rocket Man (MenacingMedia)
description: Rocket Man is a side-scrolling space shooter where you have to find and collect power cells and drop them off in the teleport machine. Power cells are the power source that the aliens want to use to destroy the earth. Collect them before its too late. This game will be a p.c. build and maybe android this is just a beta test.Please leave any comments or bugs and ideas you have.Thanks for playing. You can use a game Controller.
